snippet.title: Gran Turismo 2000 PS2 Gameplay HD (PCSX2)
snippet.description:
Gran Turismo 2000 PS2 Gameplay (DEMO)
Release Date: 1999
Platforms: PlayStation 2
_____________________________________________
Widescreen hack 16:9
//Y-Fov
patch=1,EE,002b2534,word,3F52D0E5 //3f8c8b44
//Zoom
patch=1,EE,002b2614,word,3F891A2A //3fb6cd8e

No Interlacing codes: (Credits to 'asasega' from PCSX2 forums)
patch=1,EE,2023FF70,word,00000000
_____________________________________________
PCSX2 Settings:
Renderer: OpenGL (Hardware)
Interlacing (F5): Auto
Texture Filtering: Bilinear (PS2)
Internal Resolution: 8x Native
Anisotropic Filtering: 16x
Mipmapping: Basic (Fast)
CRC Hack Level: Automatic (Default)
_____________________________________________
(✓) Enable HW Hacks:
(✓) Half-pixel Offset: Special (Texture)
_____________________________________________
Requested by: REUPLOAD 4K
_____________________________________________
My PC Specs:
CPU: Intel Core i7-4790K
GPU: GeForce GTX 1070
Ram: 16GB
OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
_____________________________________________
Please leave a comment and rate it. :)
Enjoy !
